name: Deviation Operator
intent: Encode raw difference between configurations and a reference manifold as the starting point of semantics.
algebraic\_properties: δ(c) \= 0 iff c ∈ C\_0, a distinguished reference manifold.
δ may be linear, differentiable, or functorial depending on the chosen enrichment.
Composition with Φ and Π must be well-typed, enabling H \= Π ∘ Φ ∘ δ.
constraints: δ must admit non-trivial deviations: ∃ c ∈ C with δ(c) ≠ 0.
δ must be compatible with scale maps in the SFO: δ\_{n+1} ∘ σ\_{n-\>n+1} ≈ σ\_D ∘ δ\_n.
